https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uB3XaZsQ3EThB4eCfHSEm7qPaHz.jpg Nari is a Korean-American girl who wants to enjoy her lunch just like her friends, but her noodles are far from being American. Her noodles take the form of a dragon and that seeks her attention. Afraid of judgment from her peers, she tries her best to contain the noodle dragon. Cold Lunch
